personalInfo.name: Andrew Emil
personalInfo.currentRole: Student at Computer science and Artificial intelligence - Helwan University

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a highly motivated and results-driven software developer with a strong foundation in full-stack web development and mobile app development. I thrive on building impactful applications and solving complex challenges with elegant and efficient code. My expertise includes designing scalable architectures, developing robust APIs, and creating intuitive user interfaces.

list.name: Surgical Logbook Management System
list.description: Developed a full-stack web app (React.js, Node.js/Express, MongoDB/MySQL) with secure OTP, role-based onboarding and a responsive dashboard for logging surgeries (CPT/ICD coding, anonymized data, voice-to-text notes). Added post-op peer reviews, AI-driven scheduling, analytics dashboards (with PDF/CSV export and audit trails), and multi-institution collaboration.

list.name: Seat Stream
list.description: Built a fully responsive cinema reservation web app using Next.js and Express.js with a MySQL backend, featuring an interactive seat-map selector, user authentication using JWT, booking management, and an admin dashboard for schedule and seating control.

list.name: QR Code Scanner & Generator App
list.description: Built a cross-platform Flutter application that lets the user scan QR code using the device's camera and generate custom QR codes for URLs or text. Features include real-time decode overlay and a clean Material Design UI with offline support.

list.name: Tic Tac Toe (XO Game)
list.description: Built a cross-platform Flutter app with a custom grid-based UI and provider-powered state management, featuring both two-player and single-player modes against an AI driven by Minmax algorithm, fully responsive and performant on mobile devices.

list.degree: Student at Computer science and Artificial intelligence

list.title: Freelance Web Developer
details: Conducted comprehensive code reviews and successfully deployed client websites on Vercel, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Implemented advanced SEO strategies, significantly improving website visibility and search rankings on Google.
Designed and developed robust backend APIs, seamlessly integrating MongoDB and SQL databases for scalable data management.
Engineered full-stack web applications using React and Express, delivering responsive and user-friendly solutions tailored to client needs.
